name: outlook-add-in-sso-naa-ie
title: Outlook add-in with SSO using nested app authentication including Internet Explorer fallback (preview)
shortDescription: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an Outlook add-in by using nested app authentication with a fallback that supports Internet Explorer.
longDescription: This sample shows how to implement SSO in an Outlook add-in by using nested app authentication with a fallback that supports Internet Explorer.

references.name: Enable SSO in an Office Add-in using nested app authentication including Internet Explorer compatible fallback (preview)
references.description: Learn how to enable SSO in an Office Add-in using nested app authentication including Internet Explorer compatible fallback.
